segments.text: Hi , Elvin . How are the new programmers I got for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you still mad about your nose ? How is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm serious , Zina . Back off . I have a bottle of pepper spray in my pocket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That won't be necessary , Elvin . Look , I want to apologize for your nose . I'm sorry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why are you being so nice to me ? Don't think for a second that I trust you .
segments.speaker: S2
